title: Anyone have a link to this news article?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I'm interested, saw it in the Nexus tab of the client's dashboard. When clicked, it redirects back to the [Nexus dashboard](https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/) (albeit in my browser instead).

replies.body:
Give this link a try and let me know if it still isn't working for you!

https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2017/03/dev-on-sound-design-for-the-dragon-sorceress/
